channel.title: Next procedure
channel.description:
Ok im making a script and I have problems with a procedure. I want it to go to the next procedure if a boolean returns false. Ive seen somepeople use exit but Im not sure if thats the right one.
I know its a bit strange question but I dont know how to explain. Thanks in advance
Edit: I can explain better. I want the script to go back to the first procedure if a boolean returns false. Maby this is simple but I dont know.

item.title: Next procedure
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Thank you very much. Now if only runescape would goddam load I could continue.

Read full topic

item.title: Next procedure
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

[php]

Function NoOne: Boolean;
Begin
If(This)then
Result := True
else
Result := False;
end;

Procedure NoTwo;
Begin
DoStuff;
end;

Procedure NoThree;
Begin
DoStuff;
end;

//Main Loop
Begin
NoThree;
If(NoOne = True)then
NoTwo
else
NoThree;
end.
[/php]

Or something similar to that

Read full topic
